result.eng: They use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.
result.ga: bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian
result.orig: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian
result.html: bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scianThey use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.
result.ponchtml: bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta aċ níl sé ċoṁ maiṫ leis an scianThey use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.

result.eng: He took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ga: thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.orig: Thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.html: thóg sé scian amach as a phócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé scian amaċ as a ṗócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.
